duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Media Planners and Buyers with data entry, coordination, and scheduling of campaigns for Performance Marketing clients.
Regulate the volume and flow of incoming media logs and enter/facilitate automated entry of media logs into the media system in a timely manager for media buys.
Monitor and analyze various reports daily to ensure there are no discrepancies or other media related issues.
Maintain and improve workflow efficiency for the greater media team, troubleshoot workflow problems and/or delays, and assist with other media related projects.
Provide coverage and support to other Media Coordinators & Planners, and evaluate and properly prioritize a dynamic workload between work demands.
Manage regular tasks with minimal oversight.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Advertising, Marketing, Communications, Business or related field (Preferred)
